Html:
When I try to run the tutorial 8 I get this error:

XNA Framework Reach profile does not support vertex shader model 3.0.

and then launches another error window:

No suitable graphics card found

Could not find a suitable direct3D devie that supports the XNA framework HiDef profile

I have set the useStaticImage property to true

can I run the tutorial?
How is posible HiDef profile and Reach profile errors at the same time?
